Title: Ultimate Business Controls
Description: Meet new Ribbon component for WPF. Soon other component, data grid. will be pulished.
HomeWiki:
Project description


This project basically provides metro-style custom controls for WPF developers. The primary target for creating this project is to provide developers with tools to build easily stunning applications, design of which looks like elements of Windows 8 and Office. No doubt there are such controls avaliable in market, but we would like to provide for free. Surely, there may be some bugs that we have not “noticed”, but in the future all of them will be fixed.

Avaliable controls:

Ribbon(supports theming),

OutlookBar,

Custom message box which can be restyled.

 

  1. Items can be compact by simply setting true or false to IsCompact property. 


  • We also developed wait control like in windows 8 operating system:

If have any questions or suggestions please contact us by e-mailing: dotnet.developer@mail.ru. We are looking forward to hearing from you.
